title: Integrating experimental and modelling approaches to understand and predict greenhouse gas emissions
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
impactText: Fed into modelling initiatives. Agriculture, Food and Drink,Environment Societal,Economic,Policy & public services
findingsText: Workshops on linking greenhouse gas emissions, stable isotope and modelling approaches. Further development of models for predicting greenhouse gas emissions, and strengthened coupling between experimental and modelling approaches. Agriculture, Food and Drink,Environment
